column1: Nísimaldar was the country around the haven of Eldalondë on Númenor western coast. It was the only place in Númenor where mallorn trees grew brought by Tol Eressëa
column2: and it was from the stock of these that the Golden Wood of Lothlórien came. Many other trees grew in this land
column3: all of them gifts from the Eldar.

column2: and it was so called because of the great variety of rare and beautiful trees that grew there.
